# January 2025 Newsletter - AAArdvark

# January 2025 Newsletter

 

## (Welcome to January - Happy New Year!)

 

![](https://aaardvarkaccessibility.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/january-2025.png)

Hello and welcome! We’re thrilled to kick off 2025 by launching this monthly newsletter, a dedicated space to share the latest updates from AAArdvark. Whether you’re an accessibility enthusiast or a seasoned professional, we’re excited to give you an inside look at what our team is working on.

This year, we’re starting strong with exciting new features, insightful content, and inspiring events led by our founder, Natalie MacLees. Let’s make 2025 the year accessibility takes center stage!

## Did You Know? New Page Management and Sitemap Import

One of our proudest achievements in recent months has been our updated page management feature, designed to make setting up sites on AAArdvark faster and easier than ever.

Here’s what makes it so powerful:

No more manually entering every page or having AAArdvark randomly select pages. Now, setting up a site in AAArdvark is fast and hassle-free.

## Sneak Peek At What We’ve Been Up To

Here’s a quick look at what’s new and exciting:

## Let’s Make Accessibility a Priority in 2025

Thanks for catching up with us in this month’s newsletter! We’re excited to partner with you to make the web more inclusive this year.

Stay tuned for more features, content, and events in the months ahead. Here’s to an amazing 2025—let’s make it count!

Have questions? Simply reach out to our support team. We’re here to help!
